title: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, there is no listing of children nodes.
EB: The dataset editor page should display the children nodes when changing the data source for a dataset in the query tab.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a new dataset without a SQL statement.
2. Open the dataset editor and navigate to the data source page.
3. Change the data source.

The dataset editor page should display the children nodes for the new data source. If no children nodes are visible, close the dataset editor and reopen it.
